PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-13972008-07-30,  ,  ,  ,  TC
ActRoyal Canadian Mint Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of BONNIE STAPLES-LYON of Winnipeg, Manitoba, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Royal Canadian Mint to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Darcia G. Schirr.
AttachmentsAttachment
